text.title: Lindt cafe in Sydney reopens after siege
text.head: Lindt cafe in Sydney reopens after siege
Sources

list.item: Johanna Nicholson. "Lindt cafe in Sydney's Martin Place reopens after deadly siege" — ABC News (Australia) , March 20, 2015
AP. "Sydney cafe reopens 3 months after deadly siege" — Global News , March 19, 2015
